summary: Just a replacer of the ugly chunk of metal called the Elven Dagger
descriptionHtml:
Here is my first actual mod created by me. One, I feel that there are not enough dagger mods for us stealthy type characters, and Two.. this is the big one the Vanilla Elven Dagger is just hideous imo. So I created this replacer.

Also, already built in to the mod is the DSR meshes.. no need to do anything
that being said, if you already have Dual Sheath, go into your Skryim/Data/meshes/weapons/elven and delete the elvendaggersheath.nif

Special thanks goes out to those that gave me advice and took a look at the pitiful first attempt at this:
JRCosta
MurdermeisteR
Millenia
ImsumDave

Future Plans : Stand Alone mod and adding a sheathe

Permissions : Free to use, just credit me for my work.

P.S. Feel free to let me know what you think of it.. I have thick skin, and this was the 1st complete in game model that I've done
author: scuffed_down
